text: KWXM (102.3 FM, "Sold Gold & Blues") is an American radio station broadcasting urban oldies music format. Licensed to Simsboro, Louisiana, United States, the station serves Ruston, Claiborne Parish, and surrounding areas. The station is currently owned by William W. Brown, through licensee North Louisiana Broadcasting, Inc. ==History== KWXM's frequency and ability to build a station was won by William Brown held in 2015. ==External links== * ==References== Category:Radio stations in Ruston, Louisiana Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Louisiana
title: KWXM
